title: Chest end season
body: So my brother and i were wondering what happens to the chest you have at the end of the season as in whether or not you keep them when it resets.

replies.body: You keep all essence, chests, keys, key fragments, champ/skin shards and mastery tokens that you currently possess when the season ends. You will be able to gain chests on EVERY champ you own again in Season 7. The only things that will disappear are limited time materials like championship jewels.
Who cares about chests anyway? Chests are overrated. {{champion:222}}
